name: Analytics Intelligence
tag_list: web-analytics, business-intelligence, google-analytics, sitecatalyst, artificial-intelligence, natural-language-processing
overview:
Analytics Intelligence Ltd is an innovative London based start-up company focused on the development of advanced software systems for the delivery of business intelligence and data analyses support to companies in the online market. The company aims to pioneer new approaches in digital analytics by developing a unique, technology-agnostic approach that correlates organizational goals to optimized marketing solutions.

Analytics Intelligence’s core product called the “Virtual Analyst”, is an on-demand software as a service which uses a smart agent application run by an artificial intelligence engine to seamlessly extract multi dimensional metrics from third party analytics tools.

The Virtual Analyst tool takes the client away from having yet another visualization and reporting tool to placing a virtual data analyst as a member of their team that can relate to them with a common language that they can use to discuss the activities in their channel. Available 24 hours a day either via our web interface of a mobile app, the Virtual Analyst acts as a dedicated assistant helping clients sift through a floodgate of data to identify traffic trends needed to gain actionable insight.
